original_text: Your life shall hang in doubt before you. Night and day you shall be in dread and have no assurance of your life.
korean_text: 네 생명이 위험에 처하고 주야로 두려워하며 네 생명을 확신할 수 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Your life shall hang in doubt before you.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 생명이 네 앞에서 불안하여 매달리게 되리라.

sentences.original_text: Night and day you shall be in dread
and have no assurance of your life.
